metadata.title: CVE-2022-1328 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow in uudecoder in Mutt affecting all versions starting from0.94.13 before 2.2.3 allows read past end of input line

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1328` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mutt - 1.13.2-1ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mutt package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.13.2-1ubuntu0.5').
neomutt package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
